Title: Relates to prescribing opioids to a minor
Summary: Relates to prescribing opioids to a minor; prohibits practitioners from prescribing to a minor more than a seven day supply of any controlled substance containing an opioid; requires practitioners to obtain written parental consent before issuing a first prescription of a controlled substance containing an opioid to a minor; establishes exceptions.
LawCode: Add ยง3346, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prescribing opioids to a minor
